channel.title: LocalPK/ with pictures! come join very fun server
channel.description:
Localpk for all you're Pekay Needs!
Every thinkable Combo works!
all Real Spec's
Perfect Rushing, Perfect Hybridding, perfect Range following, Perfect Melee ,Perfect Mage
features: polypore staff 75% (trains range) armadyl battlestaff full ganodermic armour nex ganodermic beasts abbysal vine whip torva pernix and virtus
amazing server with nice staff, low donator prices in the first week, donate in the first week and get a green donater cape for free (gives x20 xp)! vote for cash (20m)
World 1 is done! World 2 is under construction Photos! http://s1064.photobucket.com/albums/u375/Evanwd1/? action=view&current=market.jpg#!oZZ1QQcurrentZZhttp%3A%2F%2Fs1064.photobucket.com%2Falbums%2Fu375%2FEvanwd1%2F%3Faction%3Dview%26current%3Dmarket.jpg
download link:
http://uppit.com/yb7rw92qho1p/Localpk_Client.rar
